```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
library(httr)

bib <- RefManageR::ReadBib(here::here("publications/paperpile.bib"), .Encoding = "UTF-8", check = 'warn')

RefManageR::BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, 
                       style = "markdown",
                       bib.style = "numeric",
                       sorting = "ydnt",
                       max.names=99)
```
